quotes: She was Chair of the Board of Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance (2016 – 2020), the African Risk Capacity (2014 – 2020)
She was Chair of the Board of Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance (2016 – 2020), the African Risk Capacity (2014 – 2020)
Dr Okonjo-Iweala served twice as Nigeria’s Finance Minister (2003-2006, 2011-2015)
She is an economist and international development expert with over 30 years of experience.
and spent a 25-year career at the World Bank rising to the No.2 position of Managing Director.
